metadata.title: RDT Refinement Tracker
metadata.purpose: Track mathematical and conceptual gaps in RDT requiring resolution

priority_high.description: Core foundational gaps - must resolve for theoretical coherence

F2_to_pi.title: F2 → π Emergence
F2_to_pi.current_state: Claims π 'emerges from metric structure with rotational symmetry'
F2_to_pi.gap: No rigorous proof that F2 necessarily implies rotational symmetry
F2_to_pi.needed: Mathematical demonstration that any metric satisfying F2's properties must contain cyclic/rotational structure

D1_metaphysical_status.title: D1's Metaphysical Status
D1_metaphysical_status.current_state: Labeled 'definition' but does heavy explanatory lifting
D1_metaphysical_status.gap: Document acknowledges 'this is an axiom in disguise'
D1_metaphysical_status.needed: Either honest reclassification as axiom with justification, or formal proof that traversal ≡ experience is purely definitional
D1_metaphysical_status.impact: Grounds the arrow of time, 'now', and frequency interpretation

omega_to_spacetime_metric.title: Ω-Metric → Spacetime Metric Bridge
omega_to_spacetime_metric.current_state: d(σ,σ') exists on Ω; somehow g_μν emerges
omega_to_spacetime_metric.gap: Quantum metric tensor derivation assumes quadratic action on Ω but doesn't derive it from F1/F2
omega_to_spacetime_metric.needed: Explicit construction showing how configuration-space distance becomes spacetime geometry
omega_to_spacetime_metric.impact: Core to all geometric claims in RDT
notes: Resolved via synthesis of Entropic Gradient Construction (B) + Varadhan Diffusion Kernel (C)
D1+F4 → traversal is diffusion with entropy-seeking drift
Varadhan theorem: lim[-4Dτ log K] = d² → Ω-metric encoded in heat kernel
Entropy gradient ∇S foliates Ω: time = ∇S direction, space = perpendicular
ADM-style construction gives g_μν from (α, β^i, h_ij)
π enters through Gaussian normalization (4π)^{n/2} — mathematical necessity
EXTENSIONS COMPLETED (2026-02-02):
- Lapse α = ℏ/(k_BT) derived from uncertainty + Clausius
- n=3 dimensions from F1 + Bekenstein bound + stability
- Jacobson connection: diffusion equilibrium = entanglement equilibrium
- 8π origin: 4π (sphere) × 2 (surface gravity factor)

entanglement_equilibrium_motivation.title: Entanglement Equilibrium Motivation
entanglement_equilibrium_motivation.gap: The word 'motivates' hides a derivational void
entanglement_equilibrium_motivation.needed: Formal proof or honest acknowledgment that this is interpretive compatibility, not derivation
entanglement_equilibrium_motivation.impact: Einstein equations claim rests on this bridge

drainage_current_derivation.title: Drainage Current Derivation
drainage_current_derivation.gap: No chain from F1-F4 to this specific form
drainage_current_derivation.needed: Step-by-step derivation or acknowledgment as ansatz

priority_medium.description: Novel predictions needing formalization - required for testability

d_max_derivation.title: d_max (Maximum Entanglement Distance)
d_max_derivation.current_state: Derived from heat kernel coherence threshold
d_max_derivation.needed: Calculation from F1+F2 giving d_max in terms of known quantities
d_max_derivation.impact: Only genuinely novel testable prediction unique to RDT
notes: d_max = 2√(Dτ ln N) derived from coherence threshold K ≥ 1/N
TU Wien 232 attosecond measurement constrains D ≈ 10^-6 m²/s (atomic scale)
232 as = entanglement FORMATION time (d_Ω decreasing), not correlation speed
Once entangled (d_Ω ≈ 0), K ≈ 1 always → 'instantaneous' correlation explained
π enters through (4πDτ)^{n/2} heat kernel normalization
Testable predictions: τ ∝ d_Ω², cross-system fidelity differences, hard d_max wall

w_z_quantitative.title: w(z) Dark Energy Evolution
w_z_quantitative.needed: Derive w₀, w_a from RDT foundations
w_z_quantitative.resolution_method: A+D Synthesis: Entropy Differential → Drainage Function → w(z)
notes: Resolved via A+D synthesis approach
A: Entropy differential ΔS(τ) = tanh(τ/τ_*) between M⁺/M⁻
D: Drainage function Ψ(δ) = 1 - ε·δ modifies effective Λ
Result: w(z) = -1 + δ_w/[1 + (z/z_*)²]
CPL: w₀ = -1 + δ_w, w_a = -2δ_w/z_*
Key prediction: w_a < 0 is NECESSARY (matches DESI 2024)
DESI calibration: δ_w ≈ 0.55, z_* ≈ 0.61

psi_drainage_function.title: Drainage Rate Function Ψ(r/L_Λ)
psi_drainage_function.needed: Derive or constrain Ψ from first principles

c_from_foundations.title: c from F1+F2
c_from_foundations.current_state: Claims 'finite Ω has finite diameter → c_max exists'
c_from_foundations.gap: No derivation; c's specific value unexplained
c_from_foundations.needed: Show how N ≈ 10^(10^122) and metric structure determine c = 299,792,458 m/s

F4_arrow_of_time.title: F4 → Arrow of Time Chain
F4_arrow_of_time.current_state: 'Boyle-Turok show reflecting boundary → minimum entropy at Σ → dS/dτ > 0'
F4_arrow_of_time.needed: RDT-internal proof that F4 requires this boundary condition
F4_arrow_of_time.impact: Arrow of time is central claim

model_a_vs_b.title: Model A vs Model B (EPS)
model_a_vs_b.current_state: RDT 'predicts' Model B (geometry-based) but gives no derivation
model_a_vs_b.gap: Both models are consistent with F = P/(4πc)
model_a_vs_b.needed: Proof that entropic gravity must be mass-independent

8pi_origin.title: 8π Origin in Einstein Equations
8pi_origin.needed: Show why spherical geometry + thermodynamics gives exactly 2×

black_hole_information.title: Black Hole Information Paradox (F4)
black_hole_information.gap: No mechanism for cross-manifold information accounting
black_hole_information.needed: Either formalize or honestly demote from RDT claims

born_rule_deviations.title: Born Rule Deviations at Planck Scale
born_rule_deviations.gap: No mechanism, magnitude, or testable signature
born_rule_deviations.needed: Derive expected deviation from finite Ω
born_rule_deviations.impact: Would distinguish RDT from standard QM

tensor_product_structure.title: Tensor Product Structure from F1+F2
tensor_product_structure.needed: Proof that finite metric space → Hilbert space tensor product
tensor_product_structure.impact: Required for Born rule derivation chain

entries.title: Ω-Metric → Spacetime Metric Bridge
entries.summary: Spacetime metric g_μν emerges from Ω-metric d(σ,σ') via two mechanisms: (1) Varadhan's theorem shows the Ω-metric is encoded in diffusion kernel decay, (2) Entropy gradient ∇S from F4 separates time (drift direction) from space (perpendicular). The ADM formalism constructs g_μν from lapse, shift, and induced spatial metric. Pi enters through Gaussian normalization — the same (4π)^{n/2} that appears in κ = 1/(4π).

extensions.result: α = ℏ/(k_B T) — thermal time scale from uncertainty + Clausius
extensions.pi_connection: 2π appears via Unruh temperature T_U = ℏa/(2πck_B)

extensions.result: F1 + Bekenstein bound (S ∝ Area) + stability constraints → n=3
extensions.pi_connection: In 3D, solid angle = 4π, explaining 4π in all spherical flux laws

extensions.result: Diffusion equilibrium (ρ ∝ e^S) = entanglement equilibrium → Einstein equations

entries.title: d_max (Maximum Entanglement Distance)
entries.summary: Maximum entanglement distance d_max = 2√(Dτ ln N) derived from heat kernel coherence threshold K ≥ 1/N. The TU Wien 232 attosecond measurement (entanglement formation time for helium electrons) constrains the Ω-diffusion coefficient D ≈ 10^-6 m²/s. The 232 as is the formation time (d_Ω decreasing to 0), not correlation speed. Once entangled (d_Ω ≈ 0), K ≈ 1 always — explaining 'instantaneous' correlation. Pi enters through (4πDτ)^{n/2} heat kernel normalization.

key_results.derivation: Coherence threshold K ≥ 1/N applied to heat kernel

key_results.result: 232 as = formation time, correlation is 'instantaneous' for d_Ω ≈ 0

entries.title: w(z) Dark Energy Evolution
entries.method: A+D Synthesis: Entropy Differential → Drainage Function → w(z)
entries.summary: Dark energy equation of state w(z) = -1 + δ_w/[1 + (z/z_*)²] derived from F4 entropy differential between dual manifolds M⁺/M⁻. The entropy differential ΔS grows with cosmic time (tanh evolution), modifying the drainage function Ψ and hence effective Λ. The key result is w_a < 0 (necessarily negative), matching DESI 2024 observations. CPL parameters: w₀ = -1 + δ_w, w_a = -2δ_w/z_*.

key_results.derivation: A+D synthesis: entropy differential → drainage function → Λ_eff evolution

key_results.insight: w_a < 0 is necessary consequence of growing ΔS

testable_predictions: w_a < 0 required (w closer to -1 in past)
Transition z_* ≈ 0.5-0.7 coincides with matter-Λ equality
